title: The Bachelorette: Angie Kent enjoys racy moment with shirtless Carlin Sterritt
text:
Angie Kent is having the time of her life with this season's hunky singletons on The Bachelorette Australia.

And the bubbly blonde was all smiles on Wednesday's episode when she enjoyed a racy moment with suitor Carlin Sterritt on a beachside date.

Heading to the beach for a one-on-one date, things turned steamy when Carlin whipped off his T-shirt to reveal his abs.

Scroll down for video

It's a tough job! Angie Kent and Carlin Sterritt (pictured) enjoyed a steamy moment as she rubs sunscreen on his washboard abs during Bachelorette date

Clearly sun safety is an important issue to Angie as she jumped at the chance to give Carlin a helping hand with his sunblock.

'You should totally take your shirt off and I can put suncream on you,' she said

'What a set up!' Carlin laughed, but it didn't take long for the hunky chap to change his mind.

She was keen! Angie jumped at the chance to give Carlin (pictured) a helping hand on their beach date

'You know you want to,' Angie teased. 'You don't do your workouts for no reason.'

Revealing perfectly sculpted washboard abs, Angie couldn't help but smile as she latherered him up.

'That's very nice,' Angie said, as she made sure every inch of Carlin's chest was properly covered.

Frontrunner! Carlin's body, and sparkling personality, clearly impressed Angie during their beach date

'I mean I'm not complaining. Did you draw that on? It's like that sh**'s photoshopped,' Angie joked.

But Carlin's body, and sparkling personality, clearly impressed Angie and later as they cuddled up together on the beach, the pair enjoyed a sweet kiss.

Then after their perfect date, Angie asked Carlin if he would accept her coveted rose, before the duo locked lips again.

The Bachelorette contonues on Thursday from 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: Bachelorette Angie Kent and suitor Carlin Sterrit (pictured) enjoyed a racy moment in Wednesday's episode.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
